dict.acceptation: 肮脏的；下流的，令人讨厌的；恶劣的，艰险的；严重的；

sent.orig: I've never seen anyone as nasty as you!
sent.trans: 我没见过像你这样的Nasty人！

sent.orig: You nasty girl, you nasty, you trashy. You classless girl, you sleazy, you freaky.
sent.trans: 你是让人讨厌的女孩，你是垃圾。你有阶级性，你低俗，你古怪。

sent.orig: He is in for a nasty shock!
sent.trans: 他将碰到一件非常糟糕而震惊的事。

sent.orig: He screwed up his face at the nasty smell.
sent.trans: 闻到这令人作呕的气味，他皱眉蹙额。
